about.motivation: A few years ago, I have had the pleasure to turn my passion for Mobile and Web Development into some kind of a job. Started with simple Wordpress sites for clients in my city I gained experiences in Web Development early

projects.whitebird: Whitebird is an open-source, web-based, collaborative, digital Whiteboard built with NestJS, MongoDB, NuxtJs and FabricJs
projects.whitebird_task: As a Front-end Developer, I was responsible for the overall design and appearance of the application. One of the most exciting experiences was working with skeuomorphisms to provide the user a confidential experience
projects.conForm: conForm is a program that allows the user to create, edit and save multiple concept papers
projects.conForm_task: In this project I was involved as frontend as well as backend developer. My task was on the one hand to create the design, and on the other hand I took over the routes as well as the persistence of the data. One of the most exciting experiences was working with the backend framework: Laravel
projects.hly: Hly is a hard seltzer - an alcoholic drink with 5% alcohol
projects.hly_task: The aim of the project was to create a positive opinion among consumers and thus attract more customers for the still unknown beverage. Through various cutting techniques, a feel-good atmosphere was to be created for the users in order to positively emphasize the beverage
projects.menschenhelfen: Menschen.Helfen.Leben is a non-profit organization, whose goal is to attract as many people as possible to donate blood in the region
projects.menschenhelfen_task: I redesigned the website from scratch to highlight its goal and generally increase the usability of the site. The interaction should be made as pleasant as possible for the user. The website was designed with the help of Wordpress, Oxygen, custom JavaScript and CSS
projects.portfolio: My personal portfolio, which I designed on a whim
projects.portfolio_task: The frontend was designed using Bootstrap in combination with (S)CSS and Javascript. The logo was designed with Illustrator and animated with AnimeJS. The rest is logic and a lot of love
projects.loidl1: An e-commerce site for a client with a CMS
projects.loidl2: The frontend was designed using Oxygen, a page builder for WordPress. The store functionalities were added using WooCommerce. Individual functionalities were implemented using web technologies (JavaScript, HTML, CSS).

experience.eyeled_desc: Development of mobile user interfaces in Swift, as well as web development
experience.thesis: Implementation of a GPS-based pedestrian navigation component for outdoor exhibition grounds with optimized user guidance on mobile devices under Objective-C in iOS
experience.intern_desc: Internship in mobile software development with focus on iOS development
experience.study_deg: Bachelor of Science - BS, Media Computer Science
experience.study_master: Master of Science, MS, Computer Science
experience.minarc_desc: WordPress & WooCommerce site development for clients and businesses
experience.master2: Cross-platform development of a mobile application for operational task management
experience.master3: Conception and prototypical implementation using Flutter
